content: 2 until desired height sample shown 10 rounds ~7 5 round 1 hbhdc in every other st around → 40 sts bag top rnds 2 5 hbhdc in each st around round 6 hbhdc for 18 sts should be 1 stitch before the side of the bag see stitch and abbreviation section for instructions or view this tutorial on instagram 1 slip_stitch into next 2 sts keeping all loops on hook 3 loops on i-cord strap hook 2 drop first 2 loops hold them taut 3 working from 3rd loop o slip_stitch 1 o place 2nd loop back on hook slip_stitch 1 o place 1st loop back on hook slip_stitch 1 1 repeat until desired strap length is reached approx 24 shown line up with 3 sts on opposite side to join strap drop the live loops putting them on the outside of the bag and insert hook from inside to outside through both the bag stitch and the dropped loop slip_stitch to join each of the 3 loops continue final round of hbhdc across the remaining half of the top edge fasten_off and weave in ends optional clasp change to 6 mm hook chain 30 leaving 2 tails on each end pull each tail through the top center of the bag approx 1 2 apart tie or secure inside sew button to opposite side to align with loop weave in all ends securely finishing you are done congrats … show off your finished bag on social media and send me a pic don t forget to leave feedback now follow me on instagram or facebook @tknitsboutique pics of one of my finished bag this pattern is ©tknits 2025 personal use only redistribution prohibited small- scale sellers may use this pattern to create and sell finished products but credit to the designer is required in listings and tags mass production is not allowed thank you for respecting handmade creativity
